requirement_tested: A form-filling function for users to input personal information and credit status
user_persona: A user interested in credit repair services who wants to share basic information.
user_goal: To successfully fill out and submit the personal information form.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing the Form
narrative_steps.description: Maria visits the homepage and scrolls down to find the lead generation form. She sees fields for her name, email, phone, credit score range, and issue description.
narrative_steps.action: Click inside the 'Full Name' input field.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The field is focused and ready for text entry.

narrative_steps.title: Entering Details
narrative_steps.description: Maria fills in her name, email, and selects her approximate credit score range from the dropdown.
narrative_steps.action: Fill in all required fields and select a credit score range.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Each field accepts input, and the 'Submit' button becomes active.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting the Form
narrative_steps.description: After reviewing her entries, Maria clicks the Submit button to send her information.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Submit' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Form data is validated and sent to the /api/leads endpoint, showing a success confirmation.

user_persona: A curious visitor wanting a quick estimate of their credit standing.
user_goal: To get an estimated credit score by entering minimal identifying information.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating to Inquiry Section
narrative_steps.description: John finds the 'Check Your Credit Score' section on the homepage and sees fields for partial SSN and date of birth.
narrative_steps.action: Click inside the 'Last 4 Digits of SSN' input field.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The field focuses and allows John to enter numeric characters only.

narrative_steps.title: Providing Required Data
narrative_steps.description: John enters his last four digits of SSN and date of birth accurately.
narrative_steps.action: Enter valid SSN digits and date of birth.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Both fields accept the input and the 'Get Estimate' button becomes clickable.

narrative_steps.title: Requesting Estimate
narrative_steps.description: John clicks the 'Get Estimate' button to retrieve his credit score approximation.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Get Estimate' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Data is submitted to the external API and the estimated credit score is displayed below the form.

requirement_tested: An introduction section to credit repair services
user_persona: A new visitor unfamiliar with credit repair processes.
user_goal: To understand what services the company offers through the introductory content.

narrative_steps.title: Finding Service Introduction
narrative_steps.description: Emily scrolls to the 'Our Services' section on the homepage where she expects to see general descriptions of offerings.
narrative_steps.action: View the 'Our Services' section.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Descriptive paragraphs about debt negotiation, report disputes, and other services are visible with proper headings.

requirement_tested: A browsing interface for users to learn about credit repair services
user_persona: A user wanting detailed knowledge about specific credit repair options.
user_goal: To navigate to and read more about individual credit repair services.

narrative_steps.title: Opening Navigation Menu
narrative_steps.description: David clicks on the 'Services' link in the main navigation menu to explore available offerings.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Services' link in the navigation bar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Submenu links to specific service pages like '/services/debt-negotiation' become visible.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting a Specific Service
narrative_steps.description: David chooses 'Debt Negotiation' to learn how it works.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Debt Negotiation' submenu link.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: He is redirected to the detailed service page at '/services/debt-negotiation'.

requirement_tested: A lead submission form for collecting user information
user_persona: A potential client ready to engage with the company.
user_goal: To provide contact details and credit concerns to initiate communication.

narrative_steps.title: Locating Lead Form
narrative_steps.description: Sarah scrolls to the bottom of the homepage where the lead form is prominently displayed.
narrative_steps.action: Focus on the 'Full Name' field within the lead form.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The field activates and accepts typed input.

narrative_steps.title: Completing Fields
narrative_steps.description: Sarah fills out all necessary fields including her name, email, phone number, and a note about her credit issues.
narrative_steps.action: Enter all requested information and choose a credit score option.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Fields display correct formatting and the 'Send Information' button becomes enabled.

narrative_steps.title: Sending Lead Info
narrative_steps.description: Confident in her input, Sarah submits the form hoping to be contacted soon.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Send Information' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The form sends a POST request to /api/leads and stores the record in the PostgreSQL database, confirming receipt.

requirement_tested: Frontend that fetches all data from backend APIs
user_persona: A returning visitor expecting updated service information.
user_goal: To view dynamically loaded service content rather than static placeholders.

narrative_steps.title: Loading Homepage
narrative_steps.description: Robert opens the homepage and waits for dynamic content to load instead of seeing hardcoded text.
narrative_steps.action: Load the homepage in browser.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Service descriptions and other content areas populate via HTTP requests to http://localhost:3001/api.

requirement_tested: Backend that connects to an external PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
user_goal: To confirm the backend server establishes a successful database connection.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Backend Server
narrative_steps.description: Admin starts the backend server locally and checks logs for successful database initialization.
narrative_steps.action: Run backend server process.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Logs indicate successful connection to PostgreSQL using DB_HOST=localhost, DB_PORT=5432, etc.

requirement_tested: Repository package.json configured with npm run install:all to install both frontend and backend dependencies
user_persona: Developer setting up project for first time.
user_goal: To install all project dependencies quickly with a single command.

narrative_steps.title: Running Install Script
narrative_steps.description: Jamie clones the repo and runs the custom install script to prepare both environments.
narrative_steps.action: Execute `npm run install:all` from root directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Frontend and backend directories install their respective node_modules concurrently without errors.

requirement_tested: Repository package.json configured with npm run dev to start both frontend and backend concurrently
user_goal: To launch both frontend and backend development servers simultaneously.

narrative_steps.title: Launching Dev Servers
narrative_steps.description: Alex wants to begin working on features and needs both sides of the app running.
narrative_steps.action: Execute `npm run dev` from root directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Concurrent processes start frontend and backend dev servers successfully.

requirement_tested: Body background styled with old lace color
user_goal: To verify the entire site uses the correct background color theme.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting Background
narrative_steps.description: Taylor loads the homepage and inspects the overall background color.
narrative_steps.action: Open homepage in browser.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The body background is consistently rendered with #FDF5E6 (Old Lace).

requirement_tested: UI elements styled with rosy brown color
user_goal: To experience consistent thematic coloring of interactive elements.

narrative_steps.title: Observing UI Elements
narrative_steps.description: Jordan notices the uniformity of colors across buttons, borders, and headers.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate through key sections like forms and menus.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Interactive elements such as buttons and input borders use #BC8F8F (Rosy Brown) consistently.

requirement_tested: Form validation for user input fields
user_persona: User attempting to submit incomplete form data.
user_goal: To be guided by real-time feedback when making input mistakes.

narrative_steps.title: Leaving Incomplete Field
narrative_steps.description: Mike tries to leave the email field blank and moves focus away.
narrative_steps.action: Tab out of empty 'Email Address' field.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Inline error message appears stating the field is required.

narrative_steps.title: Trying Invalid Submission
narrative_steps.description: Without correcting errors, Mike attempts to click the submit button.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Submit' button with invalid data present.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Submission is blocked and problematic fields are highlighted visually with error indicators.

requirement_tested: Data storage for lead information in PostgreSQL database
user_persona: QA tester validating backend data persistence.
user_goal: To ensure submitted lead data is properly stored in the database.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Valid Lead
narrative_steps.description: Tester fills and submits a valid lead form from the frontend.
narrative_steps.action: Complete and submit the lead form with valid data.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A new record appears in the 'leads' table with matching field values.

requirement_tested: API endpoints for handling form submissions and credit score inquiries
user_persona: Developer testing integration points between frontend and backend.
user_goal: To validate correct behavior of exposed RESTful endpoints.

narrative_steps.title: Testing Lead Endpoint
narrative_steps.description: Dev sends a sample POST request to the lead submission route.
narrative_steps.action: Make a POST request to `/api/leads` with valid payload.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Endpoint responds with success status and stores the lead in the database.

narrative_steps.title: Testing Credit Inquiry Endpoint
narrative_steps.description: Dev makes a GET call to the credit score inquiry endpoint with parameters.
narrative_steps.action: Make a GET request to `/api/credit-score` with query parameters.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Endpoint proxies the external API and returns the credit score estimation.

user_persona: Mobile user accessing the website on a smartphone.
user_goal: To have a seamless browsing experience regardless of device size.

narrative_steps.title: Resizing Browser Window
narrative_steps.description: User resizes the browser window to simulate smaller screens.
narrative_steps.action: Resize browser viewport width to less than 768px.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Layout adjusts responsively; columns stack vertically, font sizes adapt, and navigation menus reposition accordingly.
